hero.subtitle: MykeyNest protects your credentials with military-grade AES-256 encryption and a zero-knowledge architecture. Access all your accounts safely, on all your devices.

features.label: Features
features.title: Everything you need to keep your passwords safe
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed for your security and peace of mind.

cards.e2e_text: Your data is encrypted with AES-256 before it ever leaves your device. No one can access your passwords.
cards.generator_text: Create ultra-secure passwords in one click. Unique combinations that are impossible to guess.
cards.sync_text: Access your passwords on all your devices. Always up to date, everywhere.
cards.share_text: Share credentials with your team securely, with access controls.
cards.audit_text: Detect weak or compromised passwords. Get alerts when a breach is detected.
cards.autofill_text: Log in instantly to your favorite sites with our browser extension.

how.label: Simple and efficient
how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: Start securing your passwords in 3 simple steps.

steps.s1_text: Sign up for free and create your master key. It's the only password you need to remember.
steps.s2_text: Import or manually add your existing passwords. Everything is encrypted automatically.
steps.s3_text: Log in to all your accounts in one click, on all your devices, safely.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Simple, transparent plans
pricing.subtitle: Start for free. Upgrade when you need more.

plan.basic_aria: Try the Basic plan for free

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Your questions about MykeyNest
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our password manager.

items.a1: A password manager is a security tool that stores and encrypts all your credentials in a digital vault. MykeyNest uses AES-256 encryption to protect your data.
items.a2: AES-256 is a standard used by banks. Data is encrypted locally (zero-knowledge): we never have access to it.
items.a3: Yes—there’s a free version with the essentials. Premium plans are available for advanced users and teams.
items.q4: Are my passwords synced across all my devices?
items.a4: Yes—automatic sync on desktop, smartphone and tablet.
items.q5: What if I forget my master password?
items.a5: We don’t store it. Keep it safe and use emergency recovery.
items.a6: AES-256, zero-knowledge, 2FA, regular audits, and security best practices.
